definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to pick a quarrel/to find fault/nitpicking
not proper/not fit for the occasion

sentences.english: Adding and settling of ballast in delamination.
A flat car was loading ballast outside the Shi-Fen Station.
sentences.chinese: 十分站外正在装载道碴的工程车。

sentences.english: I see. So God is picking on you?
sentences.chinese: 我明白了。你是说上帝是故意找你的碴？

sentences.english: Railway ballast will be loaded onto ballast trains at an established ballast siding.
sentences.chinese: 铁路道碴，将载入碴列车在一个既定的镇流器偏袒。

sentences.english: Railway ballast will be loaded onto ballast trains at an established ballast siding.
sentences.chinese: 铁路道碴，将载入碴列车在一个既定的镇流器偏袒。

sentences.english: A man of eighty was picking up lumps of coal along the railroad.
sentences.chinese: 一个年过八旬的老汉，这会儿正沿着铁路在捡煤碴。

sentences.english: I like my lessons, my friends and my teachers.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢我钉定草感禺啡碴拾厂浆的课程，朋友和老师。

sentences.english: Ballasted track is the most used track type in ground track of urban mass transit in existing "Code for the Design of Metro".
sentences.chinese: 有碴轨道是城市轨道交通地面线最常采用的轨道结构。

sentences.english: If you agree to all her likes, she is abusing.
sentences.chinese: 如果你对她的话完全同意，那她就会碴的像二五八万。

sentences.english: A hod of plaster for me to stop this hole with!
sentences.chinese: 弄一筐石灰碴来替我堵上这窟窿。

sentences.english: The rail beds well on the ballast.
sentences.chinese: 铁轨在道碴上搁得很稳。

sentences.english: Law is about a tutor shooting you endlessly every time you attend her tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 法律就是导师在每节课上找你的碴。

definition: to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle
stubble land after crop has been taken/a second crop obtained by rotation of land/an opportunity
to push lightly/to flick to one side/to get rid of
